product_name: Merrell Chameleon 4 Ventilator Z-Rap Shoes - Girls' - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Outfit your little one for rugged adventures in the easy-on Merrell Chameleon 4 Ventilator Z-Rap Shoes. Flexible suede leather and breathable synthetic mesh uppers keep weight low and comfort high. Z-Rap rip-and-stick closures offer quick entry that little hands can operate. Nylon mesh linings are highly breathable. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Nylon arch shanks provide support and heel air pods provide cushioning. Linings and removable footbeds are treated with Aegis Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment to deter odors from developing. The Merrell Chameleon 4 Ventilator Z-Rap Shoes feature lugged rubber outsoles for traction on all surfaces. Overstock.
short_description: Outfit your little one for rugged adventures in the easy-on Merrell Chameleon 4 Ventilator Z-Rap Shoes.
